author: Zn3zman
title: Downloadable Content
text:
This downloadable content is available to all [[Mass Effect 2]] players for purchase or download. + This downloadable content is available to all [[Mass Effect 2]] players for purchase or download . If Mass Effect 2 was purchased outside of Origin, you can download DLC content for free from EA's [https://help.ea.com/en-us/help/dragon-age/dragon-age-origins/bioware-classics-dlc/ website] . {|cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" width="100%" border="1" style="border-collapse:collapse;text-align:center;border:#333344;" {|cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" width="100%" border="1" style="border-collapse:collapse;text-align:center;border:#333344;" ! style="border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; background: rgb(34, 34, 51) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; width: 20%; text-align: left;"|Title ! style="border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; background: rgb(34, 34, 51) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; width: 20%; text-align: left;"|Title Latest revision as of 23:01, January 8, 2017 
This is a list of all Downloadable Content (DLC) items that have been made available for Mass Effect , Mass Effect 2 , Mass Effect 3 , and Mass Effect: Infiltrator . Contents
